title: What Will We Eat?
text: Jessie Ausman is a data scientist with a focus on health informatics and data visualization. She primarily uses R/RStudio in her everyday work, but also has experience working with JavaScript, CSS/HTML, Command Line, and Git Bash. She has worked with Tableau and Power BI, but prefers the familiarity of Quarto.

title: DFW Favorites
text:
DFW Favorites

Map






 


Table

title: What Will We Eat?
text: Jessie Ausman is a data scientist with a focus on health informatics and data visualization. She primarily uses R/RStudio in her everyday work, but also has experience working with JavaScript, CSS/HTML, Command Line, and Git Bash. She has worked with Tableau and Power BI, but prefers the familiarity of Quarto.

title: What Will We Eat?
text:
About Website
I created this website as a fun personal project to practice using the R Leaflet package for visualizing geographic data. As an added benefit, I hoped that this website could help me dodge arguments with my fiancé regarding what we will eat for dinner.
This website provides a few utilities to the user:

You are able to view a map of some of my favorite restaurants across DFW, which is color coded by the type of food.
You may also visit the blog page where my favorite dishes are listed for each restaurant.
You may view the restaurants in a more tabular format where you can filter each of the columns by type of food, price range, street/shopping center, and/or rating (as rated by yours truly).

title: What Will We Eat?
text:
TL;DR
I am an indecisive data scientist who decided it would be easier to make a website than it would be to actually make a decision on what I should eat for dinner.

title: Help Me Choose!
What Will We Eat?
text:
About the Website
I created this website as a fun personal project to practice using the R Leaflet package for visualizing geographic data. As an added benefit, I hoped that this website could help me dodge arguments with my fiancé regarding what we will eat for dinner.
This website provides a few utilities to the user:

You are able to view a map of some of my favorite restaurants across DFW, which is color coded by the type of food.
You may also visit the blog page where my favorite dishes are listed for each restaurant.
You may view the restaurants in a more tabular format where you can filter each of the columns by type of food, price range, street/shopping center, and/or rating (as rated by yours truly).
